name: SONOMA WATER FKA SONOMA COUNTY WATER AGENCY
sampleDescriptions: H.R. 448, Water Conservation Rebate Tax Parity Act.
Wildfire disaster relief and disaster mitigation.

Assure funding for projects and programs aimed at Salmon Recovery and Army Corps environmental restoration projects; Funding to combat invasive species; Funding for FEMA/pre-disaster mitigation; Fundi
Implementation of legislation related to biological opinion on salmonid species; WIIN, funding for environmental restoration projects by Army Corps; efforts to combat proliferation of Quagga Mussels;
H.R. 448, Water Conservation Rebate Tax Parity Act.
